snack_desc:
Gather snacks until their total number equals 10!
Use the golden snack to reset the board
and aim for high scores!
apple_desc:
Drag and gather apples until their total number equals 10!
Use the golden apple to reset the board
and aim for high scores!
coming_soon:
Snack Game is preparing a variety of games.
Please look forward to the upcoming games!
